data.actual_result: if you switch channels with mouse then it scrolls the channel pane which is understandable, but after switching channels with keyboard it just does nothing until you click in the box
data.expected_result: it goes to the top or bottom of the message panel
data.short_description: Home/End don't work in channels until you focus the chat area
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch channel - Try to press home or end
